QuestData.Title: The Fate of Sylvanas
QuestData.Description:
The time has come.
Let this bring the dark saga of Sylvanas Windrunner to a close and herald a new dawn for the Shadowlands.
Speak to me, and we will begin.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Pelagos to witness the judgment of Sylvanas Windrunner.
QuestData.RewardText: How could I possibly pass judgment to Tyrande's satisfaction when she and her people were the ones most wronged by the Banshee Queen?
